title: TaxEasy_ZA â€“ Intela Yakho. Ulimi Lwakho. Kwenziwe Kalula.
tagline: Intela Yakho. Ulimi Lwakho. Kwenziwe Kalula.
enter_id_passport: Faka inombolo yakho kamazisi noma yepasipoti
welcome_intro: Le khalkhuletha yentela esezingeni eliphezulu izokusiza ukuthi ubalise ngokunembile intela yakho yomuntu siqu yonyaka wentela ka-2025 (1 Mashi 2024 - 28 Februwari 2025).
welcome_instructions: Sicela ugcwalise zonke izigaba ngokunembile. Sebenzisa izinkinobho zokuzulazula ezingenhla ukuze uhambe phakathi kwamakhasi, futhi ubeke igundane phezu kwezithonjana zemibuzo ukuze uthole izeluleko eziwusizo.
calculation_error_message: Kube nephutha ekubaleni intela yakho. Sicela uhlole okufakile bese uzama futhi.
footer_text: Alukho ulwazi oluqoqwayo noma olugcinwayo. Ihambisana ne-POPIA.
age_tooltip:
Imikhawulo Yentela (2025):
Ngaphansi kweminyaka engu-65: R95,750
65-75: R148,217
Ngaphezu kweminyaka engu-75: R165,689
Uma imali yakho engenayo ingaphansi kwale mikhawulo, kungenzeka ungadingi ukukhokha intela.
basic_salary_tooltip:
Ikhodi 3601: Iholo Eliyisisekelo
Iholo lakho elivamile lanyanga zonke noma lonyaka ngaphambi kokuncishiswa.
Inkomba: Isigaba 1, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Faka yonke imali engenayo evamile yomsebenzi lapha.
bonus_tooltip:
Ikhodi 3605: Ibhonasi/Izinkokhelo Zonyaka
Izinkokhelo ze-13th, amabhonasi okusebenza, inkokhelo yeholide.
Inkomba: Isigaba 1, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Zonke izinkokhelo zamabhonasi zikhokhiswa intela ngokugcwele.
commission_tooltip:
Ikhodi 3606: Ikhomishini
Amakhomishini okuthengisa nezinkokhelo ezisekelwe ekusebenzeni.
Inkomba: Isigaba 1, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Faka yonke imali engenayo yekhomishini etholakele.
overtime_tooltip:
Ikhodi 3607: Isikhathi Esengeziwe
Izinkokhelo zomsebenzi ongaphezu kwamahora ajwayelekile.
Inkomba: Isigaba 1, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Zonke izinkokhelo zesikhathi esengeziwe zikhokhiswa intela.
travel_allowance_tooltip:
Ikhodi 3701: Isibonelelo Sokuhamba
Isibonelelo esitholwe ngezindleko zokuhamba zebhizinisi.
Inkomba: Isigaba 8(1)(b), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Ungafaka izindleko zangempela ngalesi sibonelelo.
other_allowance_tooltip:
Ikhodi 3713: Ezinye Izibonelelo
Izibonelelo zocingo, ikhompyutha, zokuzijabulisa.
Inkomba: Isigaba 1, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Izibonelelo eziningi zikhokhiswa intela ngaphandle uma zikhululiwe ngokukhethekile.
vehicle_fringe_tooltip:
Ikhodi 3802: Inzuzo Yemoto Engenziwe
Inani lokusetshenziswa komuntu siqu kwemoto yenkampani.
Inkomba: Isigaba 7, Isheduli Yesikhombisa
Kubalwa njengephesenti lenani lemoto.
medical_fringe_tooltip:
Ikhodi 3810: Inzuzo Yezokwelapha
Iminikelo yomqashi yezokwelapha edlula imikhawulo.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Iminikelo edlulele kuphela ekhokhiswa intela.
housing_fringe_tooltip:
Ikhodi 3804: Inzuzo Yezindlu
Inani lendlu elinikezwe umqashi.
Inkomba: Isigaba 9, Isheduli Yesikhombisa
Indlu yamahhala noma esekelwe ikhokhiswa intela.
meals_fringe_tooltip:
Ikhodi 3808: Inzuzo Yokudla
Inani lokudla elinikezwe umqashi.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11, Isheduli Yesikhombisa
Izinzuzo zokudla ezivamile zikhokhiswa intela.
other_fringe_tooltip:
Ikhodi 3812: Ezinye Izinzuzo Ezingeziwe
Noma yiziphi ezinye izinzuzo ezinikezwe umqashi.
Inkomba: Isheduli Yesikhombisa, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Izinzuzo eziningi zomqashi zinezingqinamba zentela.
interest_tooltip:
Imali Yenzalo
Inzalo yasebhange, amadiphozithi angaguquki, amabhondi.
Ukukhululwa: R23,800 (ngaphansi kweminyaka engu-65), R34,500 (65+)
Inkomba: Isigaba 10(1)(i), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
dividend_tooltip:
Imali Engenayo Yezabelo
Izabelo ezivela ezinkampanini zaseNingizimu Afrika.
Ukukhululwa: R30,000 ngonyaka
Inkomba: Isigaba 64B(2), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
rental_tooltip:
Imali Engenayo Yokuqasha
Imali engenayo evela ezindlini eziqashisayo.
Qaphela: Ikhokhiswa intela ngokugcwele, izindleko ziyancishiswa
Inkomba: Isigaba 1, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
paye_paid_tooltip:
I-PAYE (Pay-As-You-Earn)
Intela encishiswa nyanga zonke umqashi wakho.
Inkomba: Isheduli Yesine, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Lokhu kuvela kusitifiketi sakho se-IRP5.
uif_paid_tooltip:
Iminikelo Ye-UIF
Iminikelo Yesikhwama Somshwalense Wokungasebenzi.
Isilinganiso: 1% weholo (ubukhulu R177.12/ngenyanga)
Inkomba: Umthetho We-UIF
provisional_tax_tooltip:
Intela Yesikhashana
Intela ekhokhiwe kusengaphambili ngemali engenayo engeyona eyeholo.
Inkomba: Isheduli Yesine, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Kuyadingeka uma unemali engenayo engeyona eyeholo ebalulekile.
pension_tooltip:
Ikhodi 4001: Isikhwama Sempesheni
Iminikelo yakho esikhwameni sempesheni somqashi.
Umkhawulo: Okuncane kuka-R350,000 noma 27.5% wemali engenayo
Inkomba: Isigaba 11F, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
prov_tooltip:
Ikhodi 4003: Isikhwama Sokonga
Iminikelo yakho esikhwameni sokonga somqashi.
Umkhawulo: Okuncane kuka-R350,000 noma 27.5% wemali engenayo
Inkomba: Isigaba 11F, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
ra_tooltip:
Ikhodi 4006: I-Annuity Yempesheni
Iminikelo yakho yomuntu siqu ye-annuity yempesheni.
Umkhawulo: Okuncane kuka-R350,000 noma 27.5% wemali engenayo
Inkomba: Isigaba 11F, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
donation_tooltip:
Ikhodi 4030: Iminikelo
Iminikelo ezinhlanganweni ezivunyiwe ezinenzuzo yomphakathi.
Umkhawulo: 10% wemali engenayo ekhokhiswa intela
Inkomba: Isigaba 18A, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
medaid_tooltip:
Ikhodi 4005: Ezokwelapha
Iminikelo yakho yesikimu sezokwelapha.
Qaphela: Idala izikweletu zentela, hhayi izindleko ezincishisiwe
Inkomba: Isigaba 6A, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
medical_members_tooltip:
Amalungu Ezokwelapha
Inani lamalungu amakhulu ezokwelapha.
Isikweletu: R347 ngenyanga ngelungu ngalinye
Inkomba: Isigaba 6A, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
medical_dependants_tooltip:
Abancike Ezokwelapha
Inani labancike ezokwelapha.
Isikweletu: R347 (okuqala), R234 (okwengeziwe)
Inkomba: Isigaba 6A, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
addmed_tooltip:
Ikhodi 4024: Ezokwelapha Ezengeziwe
Izindleko zezokwelapha ezingakhokhelwa yizokwelapha.
Umkhawulo: Okwedlulele ngaphezu kuka-7.5% wemali engenayo ekhokhiswa intela
Inkomba: Isigaba 18, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
rental_bond_tooltip:
Inzalo Yesibambiso
Inzalo ekhokhiwe ngemalimboleko yempahla.
Qaphela: Iyancishiswa ngemali engenayo yokuqasha
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
rental_rates_tooltip:
Izilinganiso Nezintela
Izilinganiso zikamasipala nezintela zempahla.
Qaphela: Iyancishiswa ngemali engenayo yokuqasha
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
rental_insurance_tooltip:
Umshwalense Wempahla
Izinkokhelo zomshwalense wempahla eqashisayo.
Qaphela: Iyancishiswa ngemali engenayo yokuqasha
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
rental_repairs_tooltip:
Ukulungisa Nokugcinwa
Ukulungisa kwamanje, hhayi ukuthuthukiswa.
Qaphela: Iyancishiswa ngemali engenayo yokuqasha
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(d), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
rental_depreciation_tooltip:
Isibonelelo Sokwehla Kwenani
Isibonelelo sokwehla kwenani lesakhiwo.
Isilinganiso: 5% ngonyaka ngezindleko
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(g), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
rental_agent_tooltip:
Izimali Zomenzeli
Ukuphathwa kwempahla nezimali zokuqasha.
Qaphela: Iyancishiswa ngemali engenayo yokuqasha
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
rental_other_tooltip:
Ezinye Izindleko Zokuqasha
Ezinye izindleko zokuqasha ezivumelekile.
Qaphela: Kumele zitholwe ukuze kutholwe imali engenayo
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
software_licenses_tooltip:
Amalayisense Esofthiwe
Izindleko zamalayisense esofthiwe ahlobene ngqo nomsebenzi wakho we-IT (isb., amathuluzi okuthuthukisa, isofthiwe yokuklama).
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Kumele ahlobane ngqo nemisebenzi yokuthola imali.
hardware_upgrades_tooltip:
Ukuthuthukiswa Kwezingxenyekazi Zekhompyutha
Izindleko zokuthuthukiswa kwezingxenyekazi zekhompyutha ezidingekayo emsebenzini wakho we-IT (isb., i-RAM, ama-SSD emishinini ethile yomsebenzi).
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Yehla ngenani eminyakeni emi-3 ngo-33.3% ngonyaka.
medical_equipment_tooltip:
Imishini Yezokwelapha
Imishini yezokwelapha ebalulekile yokuzijwayeza (isb., ama-stethoscope, amathuluzi okuxilonga).
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Ama-stethoscope, amathuluzi okuxilonga, njll.
professional_insurance_tooltip:
Umshwalense Wokuzivikela Ochwepheshe
Izinkokhelo zomshwalense wokuzivikela ochwepheshe ezidingekayo kubasebenzi bezempilo.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Izinkokhelo ziyancishiswa ngokugcwele.
financial_software_tooltip:
Izinkokhelo Zesofthiwe Yezimali
Izinkokhelo zesofthiwe yokuhlaziya izimali, izinkundla zokuhweba, noma amathuluzi okubalwa kwezimali.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Kumele isetshenziselwe imisebenzi yokuthola imali.
market_data_tooltip:
Izinkokhelo Zedatha Yemakethe
Izindleko zedatha yemakethe yesikhathi sangempela, izindaba zezimali, noma izinkokhelo zocwaningo.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Kumele ihlobane ngqo nomsebenzi wakho.
classroom_supplies_tooltip:
Izinto Zokufundisa
Izincwadi zokusebenza, imishini yelabhorethri, izinto zobuciko
Izidingo: Ama-oda okuthenga esikole, uhlu lwempahla
Umkhawulo: R15k umkhawulo wonyaka
Inkomba: Imihlahlandlela ye-SACE
educational_materials_tooltip:
Izinsiza Zokufundisa
Izinto zokufundisa ezigunyaziwe, izinkundla zokufunda nge-e-learning
Izidingo: Ukuhambisana nekharikhulamu ye-CAPS
Inkomba: Isiyingi se-DBE 12/2025
safety_equipment_tooltip:
Imishini Yokuphepha Yokumbiwa Phansi
Imishini ebalulekile namathuluzi adingekayo ukuze kuphephe emisebenzini yokumbiwa phansi, kuhlanganise nezingubo zokuzivikela ezikhethekile nemishini yokuphefumula.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
occupation_specific_tooltip:
Izindleko Ezithile Zomsebenzi
Amathuluzi, imishini, nezindleko ezithile zomsebenzi wakho.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
Kumele zihlobane ngqo nokuthola imali engenayo.
cpd_expenses_tooltip:
Izindleko Ze-CPD/Zezifundo
Ukuthuthukiswa kochwepheshe okuqhubekayo, izitifiketi, ukuqeqeshwa.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
membership_fees_tooltip:
Izimali Zobulungu Ochwepheshe
Izimali zonyaka ezikhokhelwa izinhlangano zochwepheshe noma izinhlangano ezihlobene nomsebenzi wakho.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
books_materials_tooltip:
Izincwadi Nezinto Zokufunda
Izincwadi zobuchwepheshe, omagazini, nezinye izinto zokufunda ezihlobene ngqo nomsebenzi wakho.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
tools_equipment_tooltip:
Amathuluzi Nemishini
Izindleko zamathuluzi nemishini edingekayo emsebenzini wakho.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(e), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
home_office_tooltip:
Ihhovisi Lasekhaya
Izindleko zehhovisi lasekhaya uma lisetshenziswa kuphela futhi njalo ngezinjongo zebhizinisi.
Inkomba: Isigaba 23(b), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
travel_expenses_tooltip:
Ukuhamba Nezokuthutha
Izindleko ezitholwe ngezokuhamba zebhizinisi, kuhlanganise uphethiloli, ukugcinwa, izimali zokukhokha, nokupaka.
Inkomba: Isigaba 8(1)(b), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
fuel_expenses_tooltip:
Izindleko Zikaphethiloli
Izindleko zikaphethiloli zokuhamba zebhizinisi.
Qaphela: Ibhuku lokuhamba liyadingeka.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
maintenance_expenses_tooltip:
Ukugcinwa Kwemoto
Izindleko zokugcinwa kwemoto zokuhamba zebhizinisi.
Qaphela: Ibhuku lokuhamba liyadingeka.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
insurance_expenses_tooltip:
Umshwalense Wemoto
Izindleko zomshwalense wemoto zokuhamba zebhizinisi.
Qaphela: Ibhuku lokuhamba liyadingeka.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
toll_fees_tooltip:
Izimali Zokukhokha
Izindleko zezimali zokukhokha ezitholwe ngezokuhamba zebhizinisi.
Qaphela: Gcina amarisidi.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
parking_fees_tooltip:
Izimali Zokupaka
Izindleko zezimali zokupaka ezitholwe ngezokuhamba zebhizinisi.
Qaphela: Gcina amarisidi.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
solar_water_heater_tooltip:
Isifudumezi Samanzi Esisebenza Ngelanga
Isibonelelo sokufaka isifudumezi samanzi esisebenza ngelanga.
Inkomba: Isigaba 12B, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
solar_panels_tooltip:
Uhlelo Lwe-Solar PV
Isibonelelo sokufaka uhlelo lwe-solar PV.
Inkomba: Isigaba 12B, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
other_renewable_tooltip:
Amanye Amandla Avuselelekayo
Okunye ukutshala izimali kwamandla avuselelekayo okufanelekile.
Inkomba: Isigaba 12B, Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
legal_fees_tooltip:
Izimali Zomthetho
Izimali zomthetho ezitholwe ukuze kutholwe imali engenayo.
Qaphela: Kumele zihlobane nemisebenzi yokuthola imali.
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
allowance_expenses_tooltip:
Izindleko Zesibonelelo
Izindleko ezimelene nezibonelelo ezitholwe.
Qaphela: Amarekhodi kumele agcinwe.
Inkomba: Isigaba 8(1), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
pdf_error: Kube nephutha ekukhiqizeni i-PDF. Sicela uzame futhi.
tooltip_professional_body_fees:
Izimali Zobulungu Ochwepheshe
Izimali zonyaka ezikhokhelwa izinhlangano zochwepheshe ezidingekayo emsebenzini wakho.
Ikhodi: 4040/4041 (IRP5)
Ubufakazi: Amarisidi noma izitatimende zonyaka
Inkomba: Isigaba 11(a), Umthetho Wentela Yemali Engenayo
tooltip_professional_body_fees_IT:
Izimali Zobulungu Zochwepheshe be-IT
Izimali zobulungu bezinhlangano ezinjenge-IITPSA noma ISACA.
Isibonelo: R1,200 - R5,000 ngonyaka
Inkomba: Umhlahlandlela we-SARS PAYE
tooltip_professional_body_fees_healthcar:
Izimali Zobulungu Zokunakekelwa Kwezempilo
Izimali zobulungu bezinhlangano ezinjenge-HPCSA.
Isilinganiso: R600 - R1,500 ngonyaka
tooltip_professional_body_fees_finance:
Izimali Zobulungu Zochwepheshe Bezimali
Izimali zobulungu bezinhlangano ezinjenge-SAIPA noma SAICA
tooltip_uniforms_protective_clothing:
Izindleko Zamayunifomu Nezingubo Zokuvikela
Izindleko zamayunifomu aphoqelekile nezambatho zokuphepha.
Ikhodi: 3714/3764 (IRP5)
Imikhawulo: Akukho izingubo ezivamile
Ubufakazi: Ama-invoyisi noma umyalo womqashi
Inkomba: Umhlahlandlela we-SARS PAYE

welcome_guide.title: TaxEasy_ZA: Umhlahlandlela Wokuqala Olula
welcome_guide.subtitle: Siyakwamukela ku-TaxEasy_ZA! Lo mhlahlandlela uzokusiza ukuthi uzulazule ohlelweni futhi usebenzise ngokugcwele izici zalo.

steps.title: Khetha ulimi lwakho
steps.description: Phezulu kwesokudla ekhasini, khetha ulimi oluthandayo ohlwini olwehlayo (isiZulu, English, Afrikaans, isiXhosa, Sesotho).

steps.title: Zulazula Ezigabeni
steps.description: Ngemuva kokugcwalisa isigaba 'Ulwazi Lomuntu Siqu', chofoza 'Okulandelayo'. Uhlelo luhlelwe ngezigaba ezicacile:

subsections.name: Imali Engenayo & Ulwazi Lwe-IRP5
subsections.description: Lapha uzofaka ulwazi mayelana neholo, izibonelelo, izinzuzo ezingeziwe, imali engenayo yokutshala izimali, nentela eseyikhokhiwe.

subsections.name: Izindleko Ezincishisiwe Ezijwayelekile
subsections.description: Lapha ufaka izindleko ezincishisiwe ezijwayelekile nezindleko zezokwelapha.

subsections.name: Izindleko Ezincishisiwe Ezithuthukile Nezomsebenzi
subsections.description: Uma kufanele, khetha umsebenzi wakho ukuze uvule izindleko ezincishisiwe ezithile.

steps.title: Sebenzisa Izinkinobho Zokuzulazula
steps.description: Sebenzisa lezi zinkinobho ukuze uzulazule ohlelweni:
items: Chofoza 'Okwedlule' ukuze ubuyele emuva ukuze ubuyekeze noma uhlele ulwazi olwedlule

sections.title: Ukuqonda Amathuluzi Okusiza Nezinsiza
sections.description: Kulo lonke uhlelo, uzobona izithonjana zemibuzo (?) eduze kwezinkambu ezahlukahlukene. Lezi zinikeza izincazelo ezinemininingwane mayelana:

sections.title: Ukuqonda Isifinyezo Sakho Sentela
sections.description: Ngemuva kokufaka lonke ulwazi, uzofika ekhasini 'Isifinyezo Sentela'. Uzobona okulandelayo:

actions.description: Uma usunelisekile ngesifinyezo sakho, ungakhiqiza umbiko we-PDF ngenkokhelo encane.
Sebenzisa le nkinobho ukuze ukhokhe ngokuphepha ngombiko wakho we-PDF.
Uma unekhodi yesaphulelo, yifake enkambini enikeziwe bese uchofoza 'Faka Isicelo'.
Uma uhlela noma yiluphi ulwazi lwakho, chofoza 'Bala Kabusha' ukuze ubuyekeze isifinyezo.

sections.title: Udinga Usizo?
sections.description: Chofoza 'Imibuzo Evame Ukubuzwa' phezulu kwesokudla ekhasini ukuze ufinyelele imibuzo nezimpendulo ezivamile.

welcome_guide.closing_message: Sithemba ukuthi lo mhlahlandlela uzokusiza ukuthi usebenzise i-TaxEasy_ZA ngempumelelo!

livestock_depreciation_tooltip: Ukwehla Kwenani Lemfuyo: Ukunciphisa inani lemfuyo esetshenziselwa ukulima ngenxa yobudala, ukuguga, noma ezinye izinto.
safety_training_tooltip: Izindleko Zokuqeqeshwa Kwezokuphepha: Izindleko ezihlaba umxhwele ngeqeqeshwa lokuphepha nelishelwe abasebenzi bezimayini.
